759060.name: Ground Runner: Trials
759060.description:
Get ready to experience incredible VR vehicle-based combat like you’ve never seen! Strap into your hoverbike’s cockpit and prepare to outgun and outfly your enemies to become the ultimate Groundrunner in the system

You’re a Ground Runner, a scavenger whose job is to scour the backwater mining planet you live on for precious Torsion Crystals - a newly discovered, extremely powerful but hazardous form of resource which is being mined all over the sector.

For too long, an oppressive corporate alliance has controlled the sector but lack of resources has halted their spread across space. The discovery of torsion crystals has begun to change this.

Now it’s time to take the fight to the Alliance.


Groundrunner Trials puts you in full control of your hoverbike with complete freedom of movement and an awesome array of weapons at your disposal. Strap in, set the throttle to max and prepare to dominate the battlefield in the most intense VR vehicle-based shooter you’ve ever experienced.
